name: Spacetech Aviation College
about: SpaceTech Aviation College offers a comprehensive range of aviation courses, including piloting, air regulations management, and airport ground operations. Our programs are designed to equip students with the necessary skills and knowledge to excel in the aviation industry. From foundational flight training to advanced management courses, our curriculum is tailored to meet the diverse needs of aspiring aviation professionals. With a focus on safety, professionalism, and precision, we provide a thorough education that prepares students for various roles within the aviation sector. Enroll with us to embark on a career in aviation with confidence and expertise.
services:
["Private Pilot License (PPL)
Commercial Pilot License (CPL)
Airline Transport License (ATPL)
Instrument Rating
CFI
CFII"]
